text.value: The link is expired or wrong! Please resubmit the withdrawal request!

text.value: Cancel withdrawal, the amount will be added to balance of users

text.value: Mobile verification code is not correct!

text.value: The mobile phone number is not correct!

text.name: InterestRule1
text.value: After 30 days, your rewarded Token become available for withdrawal or interest collection;

text.name: InterestRule2
text.value: An amount of Tokens, as you can see above, will be given as interest for available Token each 24 hours;

text.name: InterestRule3
text.value: You will not receive interest for the Token you have withdrawn;

text.name: InterestRule4
text.value: Daily interest = your available Token/ Available Token from all participants * Total amount of Interest given in the same 24 hours;

text.name: InterestRule5
text.value: If any type of cheating is detected, the accounts associated will be terminated, all previous rewards will be reset to zero;

texts.text: Minimum amount required to withdraw is 1 Token.
Withdrawal will take up to 5 workdays to process.
After 30 days, your rewarded Token become available for withdrawal or interest.
You will not receive interest for the Token you have withdrawn.

text.name: WithdrawDepositConfirmTips
text.value: The amount you withdraw will not receive interests anymore. Please confirm your ETH address {0}.

text.name: WithdrawalAddressCanNotBeNull
text.value: Wallet address can not be null!

text.name: Invitation_Code_Hint
text.value: Invitation code must include digits(0-9) and alphanumeric characters（a-zA-Z）

text.name: BindTelegramRobotResultFailure
text.value: Connected to Telegram bot unsuccessfully, please retry！

text.name: VersionDeclaration
text.value: This is only for testing, no actual reward will be given!

text.name: SecretCodeForTelegramRobot
text.value: Secret code used to bind the Telegram Robot

text.name: BindTelegramRobotTip
text.value: Click the button below to bind the Telegram robot. You can get token reward by speaking actively in the telegram group after binding！

text.name: ActivityRule1
text.value: An amount of Tokens, as you can see above, will be given as assignments reward for to all participants each 24 hours;

text.name: ActivityRule2
text.value: Complete the assignments below to earn you points, which are then used to calculate the total amount of Tokens rewarded at the end of each 24 hours;

text.name: ActivityRule3
text.value: The amount of Token rewarded = your total points / total points combined from all participants * Total amount of Token given in the same 24 hours;

text.name: ActivityRule4
text.value: Withdrawal of Token will be available one month after earning;

text.name: ActivityRule5
text.value: If any type of cheating is detected, the accounts associated will be terminated, all previous rewards will be reset to zero;

text.name: ActivityRuleNote
text.value: (Note: Your account MUST first be connected to either your Twitter, Telegram or GitHub account before to you can start earning points through those platforms!)

text.name: ActivityRule7
text.value: The more followers you have on social media, the more points you will get. For example, 1~100 twitter followers will double your twitter points; 101~1000 follower will triple them; 1001~10000 will multiply your points by 5 and more than 10000 by 10.

text.name: HierarchicalRewardRule1
text.value: Participants invited directly by you or by your invitees, up to 8 degrees , reflects your influence;

text.name: HierarchicalRewardRule2
text.value: An amount of Tokens, as you can see above, will be given as influence reward for to all participants each 24 hours;

text.name: HierarchicalRewardRule3
text.value: When members under your influence completed assignments, you can earn influence points according to their degrees in the influence, which are then used to calculate the total amount of Tokens rewarded at the end of each 24 hours; (See calculation method in the table below)

text.name: HierarchicalRewardRule4
text.value: The total points you earned via influencing others = sum of points earned in each degree; (More details in table below)

text.name: HierarchicalRewardRule5
text.value: The amount of Token rewarded = The total points you earned via influencing others / total points all participants earned via influencing *Total amount of Token given in the same 24 hours;

text.name: HierarchicalRewardRule6
text.value: Withdraw of Token will be allowed one month after earning;

text.name: HierarchicalRewardRule7
text.value: If any type of cheating is detected, the accounts associated will be terminated, all previous rewards will be reset to zero;

text.name: GoToGroup
text.value: Go to group and add members

text.value: Please connect to {0} first by clicking the button on the top

text.name: DashboardDemo_Note_Title
text.value: Welcome to ASP.NET Zero startup project!

texts.text: In this demo, you can use the left menu to test the application. This dashboard page is just for demonstration, but all other pages and functionalities are fully implemented, working and ready for production. You can add/apply your business requirements on this startup project (or remove any functionality you don't need). Thus, you can have a signification time gain to immediately start your own project requirements.

text.name: WelcomePage_Info
text.value: Welcome to the application. You can use the menu to start using the application. If you don't see any menu item, probably you don't have permission to see any page. Consider to ask system administration for permissions.

text.value: A password reset link sent to your e-mail address. Please check your emails.

texts.text: Timezone setting changed. Click OK button to refresh page and changes to take effect.
You can not be friend with yourself.
You have a new chat message
You don't have any friends. Write a username to above input box and click "Add Friend" button.
You don't have any blocked users. In order to block a friend, select a friend and select block from actions dropdown.

Write only username for same tenant users,
[tenancyName]\[userName] for other tenant's users

for example:
.\admin -> for host admin
Test\admin -> for test tenant's admin
admin -> for your tenant's admin
Chat is not enabled for you.
Chat is not enabled for tenant.

Chat with other tenants is not enabled for you.
Chat with other tenants is not enabled for tenant.

Chat with host is not enabled for tenant.

Please enter the verification code sent to you.

Maximum number of failed login attempt count before locking the account
Allow to remember browser. If you allows this, users can select to remember browser to skip second time two factor login for the same browser.

Passwords must be at least {0} characters.
